ability: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When?this?card?attacks, if a card named "Pu-pukupuu!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Fleet Girl》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Uduki, Heading out-! I'll do my best!

name: Light Cruiser Who Takes Care of Sister Ships, Tatsuta
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets -1 level while on the stage. 【CONT】 If the number of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters is two or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Thank you. Would you keep this a secret from Tenryu?

name: 4th Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Uduki-Kai
ability: 【CONT】 If you would pay the 【ACT】 cost for one of your characters on the stage, you may put a marker from underneath this card into your waiting room instead of a card from your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "4th Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Uduki" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: The gunfire assault is going to start!

name: 1st Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Nagara-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put three cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Can you keep up with Nagara?

name: 3rd Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Yayoi
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of markers underneath this card is two or more, this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.".

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If the number of markers underneath this card is one or less, choose a card named "1st Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Mutsuki" or "2nd Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Kisaragi" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text: As I said, I am not mad… Please don't be concerned about it.

name: Present of Appreciation, Uduki
flavor_text: Uduki is impressed!

name: 3rd Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Natori-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Light Cruiser》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: E-Enemy Spotted! … Is it going to be a real battle!?

name: 3rd Kuma-class Torpedo Cruiser, Kitakami-Kai
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "4th Kuma-class Torpedo Cruiser, Oi-Kai" get +2000 power.
flavor_text: 20 firing tubes of oxygen torpedoes, firing the 2nd volley.

name: 4th Kuma-class Torpedo Cruiser, Oi-Kai
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "3rd Kuma-class Torpedo Cruiser, Kitakami-Kai" get +2000 power.
flavor_text: The destructive powers of these torpedos, I'd like you to use them well.

name: 2nd Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Isuzu-Kai-Ni
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent reveals the top card of his or her deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavor_text: Isuzu can see everything.

name: Hi-Speed Repair Agent
ability: Choose a level 2 or higher character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: It shortens the time spent in the docks.

name: If you are fine with Haruna, I'll take you on any time!
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (COMEBACK@: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Haruna! Will not! Allow such selfishness!

name: Pu-pukupuu!
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: This is the power of the Mutsuki-classed ships! Eh heh!

name: Soryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Soryu-Kai-Ni
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When?this?card?attacks, if a card named "Attack force, head out now-!" is in your climax area, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul."
flavor_text: So, let's go get us a big one!

name: Hiryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Hiryu-Kai-Ni
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of "Hiryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Hiryu-Kai-Ni" in your waiting room is two or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is in the center stage, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Yes! With this we won't lose to the First Carrier Division!

name: Obstinate Class Leader, Shiratsuyu-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if this card is in your center stage, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 1 or higher, put this card into your waiting room. If that card is level 0 or lower, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, draw up to one card.
flavor_text: Ahhh-! It hurts!

name: Command Ship of the 2nd Destroyer Squadron, Murasame-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When?this?card?attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Newly Constructed Repair Ship, Akashi-Kai
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters in front of this card get +500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］"

【AUTO】 When a card named "From which ship do I start to repair?" is placed on your climax area, if the number of cards in your clock is one or less, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters.

name: 1st Myoko-class Heavy Cruiser, Myoko-Kai-Ni
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters is four or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If the number of your other characters with "Assist" is two or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
flavor_text: For the sake of my sisters, Myoko is prepared to fight to the bitter end!

name: Newly Constructed Repair Ship, Akashi
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Admiral, do you need repairs too? So where are you damaged?

name: Ryuho-class Light Aircraft Carrier, Ryuho-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Let me show you, the true power of Aircraft Carrier Ryuho!

name: 4th Myoko-class Heavy Cruiser, Haguro-Kai-Ni
ability: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Haguro of The Fifth Squadron, heading out!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your 《Fleet Girl》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I will protect everyone's backs!

name: 1st Nagato-class Battleship, Nagato-Kai
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or more, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory.

name: 2nd Nagato-class Battleship, Mutsu-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Fleet Girl》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: 5th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Harusame
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Drum Can(Transport Use)" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I will be heading off for expedition duties.

name: Taigei-class Submarine Tender, Taigei
ability: 【CONT】 If your level is two or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose a card named "Ryuho-class Light Aircraft Carrier, Ryuho-Kai" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on."
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: 3rd Myoko-class Heavy Cruiser, Ashigara-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Combat, Battles and Victory are calling out to me!

name: 4th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Yudachi-Kai-Ni
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: 2nd Shoho-class Light Aircraft Carrier, Zuiho-Kai
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw a card.

name: Ryuho-class Light Aircraft Carrier, Ryuho-Kai
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Don't look down on us remodeled Aircraft Carriers!" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is lower than or equal to the level of this card, you may put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck."
flavor_text: Mobile task force, it’s a sortie! Let us head out with the will to win!

name: Drum Can(Transport Use)
ability: Look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: These drum cans are usually fastened together for easy transport. They are usually used for runs such as the "Tokyo Express".

name: Food Supply Ship, Irako
ability: Choose one of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card."
flavor_text: "Sweets will immediately get some of the fleet girls excited!"

name: Haguro of The Fifth Squadron, heading out!
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (GATE@: When this card triggers, you may choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: Gunners, please begin firing!

name: Attack force, head out now-!
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (DRAW@: When this card triggers, you may draw a card.)
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: It's time for a counterattack… All planes on deck, sortie!

name: From which ship do I start to repair?
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: I can repair even more now! Thank you very much!

name: Don't look down on us remodeled Aircraft Carriers!
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Continue the assault! Ryuho, Attack Squadron, launching!

name: 1st Akiduki-class Destroyer, Akiduki
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【AUTO】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Behold Akiduki's 10cm guns and anti-aircraft fire director. With this power, I will protect the fleet!

name: 5th Asashio-class Destroyer, Asagumo
ability: 【ACT】[【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text: See, didn't I tell you? I won't lose to those from the Kagero-class. Isn't it obvious!
